attributes.action: Stop issuing fines/probation for school SEN low attendance.
attributes.additional_details: For causing additional stress to already stressed parents whose children have low attendance for medical reasons.
attributes.background: Stop fining/criminalizing parents of SEN kids.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Limit enforcement of school attendance for parents of SEN children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/656866
